news.title: Trump Approves Deal Between Oracle and TikTok
news.description: Averting a possible ban of TikTok downloads in the US, President Trump approved a tentative deal giving Oracle and Walmart a minority stake in a US-based company that will run TikTok.

news.title: US Judge Temporarily Halts Trump’s WeChat Ban
news.description: A federal judge in California has issued a preliminary injunction on free speech grounds blocking President Trump’s executive order seeking to ban Chinese app WeChat in the US.

news.title: Backup Driver of Autonomous Uber SUV Charged With Negligent Homicide in Arizona
news.description: The backup driver’s visual distraction was allegedly a contributing factor in the March 2018 crash, which led to the death of a person who was crossing the road with a bicycle at night.

news.title: Portland Adopts Strictest Facial Recognition Ban in Nation to Date
news.description: Two ordinances passed by the Portland City Council prohibit the use of facial recognition technology by public entities, including law enforcement, and limit its use by private entities.
